TextLibrary.Text: Khalkus will not let you keep the key. But maybe if you ask him to leave...
The Ogre has chased you away, you will need to try again.
Having defeated the Ogre, a quick search turns up the heirloom - a fine looking key. Nobody is watching - it would be very easy to keep it!
Khalkus is overjoyed that you have returned the heirloom. He names you a Dwarf-Friend (and you gain +2 Morale).
Khalkus is sad to learn that the heirloom was lost.
You must go to the Ogre's Tower and search for the heirloom.
You must now return the heirloom to Dhun-Kor (or you could keep it and say it was lost).
